events.title: Opening Ceremony
events.description: A grand formal inauguration marking the start of the event, setting the stage for an exciting lineup of cybersecurity discussions and activities.

events.title: Cryptographic Encryption -- From Basic Principles to Advanced Notions
events.speaker: Dr. Monosij Maitra (IIT Kharagpur)
events.description: An engaging session exploring the fundamentals and cutting-edge advancements in cybersecurity, with a deep dive into cryptographic encryption techniques.

events.title: Hardware Security
events.speaker: Prof. Rajat Subhra Chakraborty (IIT Kharagpur)
events.description: A comprehensive cybersecurity session delving into advanced threats targeting hardware and the innovative defenses designed to counter them.

events.title: Architecture and Methods for Fine Grained Detection and Mitigation of Cache Side Channel Attacks
events.speaker: Dr. Sharad Sinha (IIT Goa)
events.description: A technical deep-dive into system security, focusing on emerging research and methods for detecting and mitigating cache side-channel attacks with precision.

events.title: DoS/DDoS Attacks: Underestimating the Availability Component of Cyber Security
events.speaker: Dr. Nikhil Tripathi (IIT(ISM) Dhanbad)
events.description: An insightful discussion on the often-overlooked availability aspect of cybersecurity, tackling the complexities of DoS and DDoS attack prevention.

events.title: Cyber Physical Systems Security
events.speaker: Dr. Rohit Kumar (Shiv Nadar University)
events.description: A compelling exploration of cybersecurity research, offering insights into securing cyber-physical systems alongside practical best practices.

events.title: Cyber Physical Systems Security
events.speaker: Prof. Shashikala Tapaswi (ABV-IIITM Gwalior)
events.description: An in-depth discussion on threat intelligence, featuring advanced security analysis techniques and strategies to stay ahead of cyber risks.

events.title: Side-channel Attacks
events.speaker: Dr. Bodhisatwa Mazumdar (IIT Indore)
events.description: An interactive and dynamic session unraveling the intricacies of side-channel attacks, with a focus on cryptography and network security applications.

events.title: Web Application Security and Pentest
events.speaker: Dr. Gaurav Varshney (IIT Jammu)
events.description: A hands-on workshop diving into cryptographic techniques and secure communication protocols, with practical exercises in web application security and penetration testing.

events.title: Hardware Security Attacks on Edge Devices and Defence Techniques
events.speaker: Dr. Aditya Japa (Ulster University, UK)
events.description: A detailed examination of security vulnerabilities in edge devices, coupled with governance strategies and robust defense techniques to safeguard them.

events.title: CTF Level-1
events.description: The thrilling first level of the Capture The Flag competition, running all day and challenging participants with real-world cybersecurity puzzles.

events.title: IoT and Industrial Cyber Physical System (CPS) Security
events.speaker: Dr. Saumya Bhadoria (ABV-IIITM Gwalior)
events.description: An illuminating session addressing the unique cloud security challenges in IoT and industrial CPS, paired with actionable solutions.

events.title: Attack Analysis
events.speaker: Mr. Prajjwal Govil (TCS)
events.description: A practitioner's perspective offering industry insights into real-world cybersecurity practices and effective attack analysis techniques.

events.title: Session
events.speaker: Prof. Durga Toshniwal (IIT Roorkee)
events.description: A fascinating exploration of machine learning applications in cybersecurity, showcasing their potential to transform threat detection and response.

events.title: Session
events.speaker: Dr. Rajesh Gupta (Nirma University)
events.description: A thought-provoking discussion on the development and implementation of security policies and frameworks to bolster organizational defenses.

events.title: Hardware-Based Post-Quantum Cryptography Accelerators: SABER as a case study
events.speaker: Dr. Malik Imran (Queen's University, UK)
events.description: A forward-looking session on advanced cryptographic research, spotlighting real-world implementations of post-quantum accelerators like SABER.

events.title: Web Services Security
events.speaker: Prof. P. Santhi Thilagam (NIT Surathkal)
events.description: An expert-led exploration of network intrusion detection and mitigation techniques tailored to securing modern web services.

events.title: Session
events.speaker: Dr. Vimal Dwivedi (Ulster University, UK)
events.description: A cutting-edge session delving into cyber forensics and data protection, highlighting the latest research and practical applications.

events.title: Blockchain and Federated learning for IOT security
events.speaker: Dr. Padmavathu U. (Shiv Nadar University)
events.description: A detailed overview of penetration testing methodologies and best practices, enhanced by blockchain and federated learning for IoT security.

events.title: Attack Detection and Mitigation for IoT Ecosystems: Adaptive, Scalable, and Lightweight Approaches
events.speaker: Dr. Bhale Pradeepkumar (IIITDM Kancheepuram)
events.description: A focused session on IoT security challenges, presenting adaptive, scalable, and lightweight frameworks for attack detection and mitigation.

events.title: Session
events.speaker: Dr. Nitesh Bharadwaj (NIT Raipur)
events.description: A strategic discussion on threat intelligence and incident response, equipping attendees with proactive cybersecurity strategies.

events.title: Session
events.speaker: Dr. Yasir Ali Shah (Ulster University, UK)
events.description: An advanced session on malware analysis, covering detection and prevention techniques to combat evolving cyber threats.

events.title: CTF Level-2
events.description: The advanced round of the Capture The Flag competition, pushing participant's cybersecurity skills to the limit with complex challenges.

events.title: CTF Winners Announcement & Closing Ceremony
events.description: A celebratory finale featuring the announcement of Capture The Flag winners and the official closing of this impactful cybersecurity event.
